title: Why We Invest in Teams: From Hype to You Too

quotes.quote: Is this a team that can get somewhere great?
quotes.speaker: David Thyresson

quotes.quote: What we look for early is: Confidence without arrogance
quotes.speaker: David Thyresson

quotes.quote: We’re not betting that version one will work. We’re betting that this group of people can keep writing, creating, building, shipping until something connects.
quotes.speaker: David Thyresson

author: David Thyresson
